paragraphs: The Czech division of Netflix has released a trailer for the continuation of the series "Wednesday" featuring the legendary song "Jožin z bažin."
The swamp monster, especially dangerous for the residents of Prague, fit perfectly into the gloomy atmosphere of the "Nevermore" academy.
It is interesting that Ivan Mladek, the author and performer of the song Jožin z bažin, appeared in the video, first presenting it in 1977 with his band "Banjo Band".
The second half of the second season of "Wednesday" was released on Netflix on Wednesday, September 3rd.
